overview: It is the directorial debut film of Farook Abdulrahiman, startting Manoj K. Jayan, Tirtha Murbadkar, Vaiga, Kalamandalam Sivan Namboodiri, Babu Namboothiri, Manju Pillai, and Mani Pattambi in lead roles.  It is about Kathakali actor, Kunhiraman and his relationship with his Guru, Asan. Gradually over the years, as the actor gets popular he becomes arrogant and takes to confronting with his Guru.

production_companies.name: National Film Development Corporation of India

tagline: പ്രണയം ജീവിതവും ജീവിതം പ്രണയവുമാകി മാറ്റിയ കളിയച്ചനെ അടുതുഅറിയാന്‍...
title: Kaliyachan
